metadata.title: Project Charter Guided Form
metadata.description: Step-by-step guided form for creating a comprehensive project charter

fields.label: Project Title
fields.help_text: Provide a short, descriptive name for the project.

fields.label: Executive Sponsor
fields.help_text: Who is the executive sponsor providing oversight and resources?

fields.label: Project Manager / Lead
fields.help_text: Who is leading the day-to-day execution of this project?

fields.label: Project End Date
fields.help_text: When is the project expected to complete?

fields.label: Vision Statement
fields.help_text: What is the high-level vision or desired future state?
fields.example: Create a seamless, mobile-first customer experience that increases satisfaction and reduces support calls by 40%.

fields.label: Problem Statement
fields.help_text: What problem or opportunity is this project addressing?
fields.example: Our current ordering system is outdated, leading to 25% cart abandonment and frustrated customers across EMEA markets.

fields.label: Project Description
fields.help_text: Provide a brief narrative description including context and goals.
fields.example: This project will modernize our ordering platform by implementing a new microservices architecture, redesigning the user interface, and integrating with our updated payment gateway.

fields.label: In Scope
fields.help_text: What is explicitly included in this project? List key items.
fields.placeholder: Enter scope items one at a time...
fields.example: User interface redesign for mobile and desktop

fields.label: Out of Scope
fields.help_text: What is explicitly excluded from this project?
fields.placeholder: Enter exclusions one at a time...

fields.label: Project Risks
fields.help_text: What are the known risks to project success?
fields.placeholder: Enter risks one at a time...

fields.label: Project Assumptions
fields.help_text: What assumptions are we making for planning purposes?
fields.placeholder: Enter assumptions one at a time...
fields.example: Engineering team availability remains stable throughout the project

fields.label: Project Milestones
fields.help_text: Define key milestones with phase, deliverable, and target date.
fields.placeholder: I'll ask for phase, deliverable, and date for each milestone...
fields.example: Phase: Initiation | Deliverable: Charter Approved | Date: 2025-01-31

fields.label: Success Metrics
fields.help_text: How will we measure success? Include benefit, metric, and measurement system.
fields.placeholder: I'll ask for benefit, metric, and measurement approach...
fields.example: Benefit: Faster checkout | Metric: Average order time | Measurement: Analytics dashboard

fields.label: Core Team Members
fields.help_text: Who are the key team members and their roles?
fields.placeholder: I'll ask for name, role, and optionally responsibilities...
fields.example: Name: Maria Garcia | Role: UX Designer | Responsibilities: User research and interface design

back.description: Go back to the previous field

edit.description: Edit a specific field by name

skip.description: Skip the current field (required fields will be flagged)

preview.description: Show all captured values so far

cancel.description: Cancel the form and discard progress

validation_rules.no_special_chars_start: Project name should not start with special characters
validation_rules.single_name_only: Please provide a single person's name
validation_rules.valid_date: Date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format
validation_rules.not_in_past: Start date should not be in the past
validation_rules.after_start_date: End date must be after start date
validation_rules.dates_in_sequence: Milestone dates should be in chronological order
validation_rules.no_vague_metrics: Metrics must be specific and measurable
validation_rules.unique_names: Team member names should be unique
